Package ohos.agp.graphics

Interface SurfaceOps.Callback

  • Enclosing interface:
    SurfaceOps

    public static interface SurfaceOps.Callback
    Represents the callback of the surface ops.

    This interface needs to be implemented by your application. It is used to provide the callback when a Surface is created, changed, or removed. You can add the callback using SurfaceOps#addCallback.

    Since:
    3

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void surfaceChanged​(SurfaceOps holder, int format, int width, int height)
      Called back when the surface is changed.
      void surfaceCreated​(SurfaceOps holder)
      Called back when the surface is created.
      void surfaceDestroyed​(SurfaceOps holder)
      Called back when the surface is destroyed.

    • Method Detail

      • surfaceCreated

        void surfaceCreated​(SurfaceOps holder)
        Called back when the surface is created. For details, see SurfaceOps.
        Parameters:
        holder - Indicates the surface ops that holds the created surface.

      • surfaceChanged

        void surfaceChanged​(SurfaceOps holder,
                    int format,
                    int width,
                    int height)
        Called back when the surface is changed. For details, see SurfaceOps.
        Parameters:
        holder - Indicates the surface holder that holds the changed surface.
        format - Indicates the surface format.
        width - Indicates the surface width.
        height - Indicates the surface height.

      • surfaceDestroyed

        void surfaceDestroyed​(SurfaceOps holder)
        Called back when the surface is destroyed. For details, see SurfaceOps.
        Parameters:
        holder - Indicates the surface ops that holds the destroyed surface.
